meanings.definition: A person or thing that swishes.
meanings.sent1: The swishers of the trees could be heard in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I saw the swishers of the broom as it cleaned the floor.
meanings.sent3: The swishers of the curtains made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: Her dress had swishers that flowed gracefully as she walked.
meanings.sent5: The swishers of the waterfall were soothing to listen to.

meanings.definition: A type of cigar used for rolling marijuana.
meanings.sent1: He rolled a joint using swishers as the wrapping.
meanings.sent2: The group decided to smoke some weed using swishers.
meanings.sent3: The party was a hit with swishers being passed around.
meanings.sent4: She lit up a swisher and took a long drag.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of marijuana filled the room as they smoked swishers.
